Parameter.Name: Port
Parameter.Description: Many programming blocks require that you select the ports on the EV3 Brick (A, B, C, D, 1, 2, 3, and 4) that these blocks will use. The Port Selectors are in the top right-hand corner of these blocks.

Parameter.Name: GyroX
Parameter.Description:
Type: Numeric
Notes: Angular velocity along the X-axis

Parameter.Name: GyroY
Parameter.Description:
Type: Numeric
Notes: Angular velocity along the Y-axis

Parameter.Name: GyroZ
Parameter.Description:
Type: Numeric
Notes: Angular velocity along the Z-axis

Parameter.Name: Comparison
Parameter.Description:
Type: Numeric
Allowed Values: 0 - 5
Notes: 0: = (Equal to)
1: ≠ (Not Equal to)
2: > (Greater than)
3: ≥ (Greater than or Equal to)
4: < (Less than)
5: ≤ (Less than or Equal to)

Parameter.Name: Threshold
Parameter.Description:
Type: Numeric
Allowed Values: Any number
Notes: Value to compare sensor data to

Parameter.Name: Result
Parameter.Description:
Type: Logic
Notes: True/False result of a Compare mode.

Block.Description: The Measure - Acceleration mode measures and outputs the accelerations along the X, Y, and Z axes.
The Measure - Acceleration mode measures and outputs the temperature.
The Measure - Acceleration mode measures and outputs the angular velocities along the X, Y, and Z axes.
The Measure - Tilt mode measures and outputs the tilts along the X and Y axes.
The Compare - Acceleration X-axis block compares the acceleration along the X-axis to the threshold value. The True/False result is output to the Compare Result.
The Compare - Acceleration Y-axis block compares the acceleration along the Y-axis to the threshold value. The True/False result is output to the Compare Result.
The Compare - Acceleration Z-axis block compares the acceleration along the Z-axis to the threshold value. The True/False result is output to the Compare Result.
The Compare - Temperature block compares the temperature to the threshold value. The True/False result is output to the Compare Result.
The Compare - Gyroscope X-axis block compares the angular velocity along the X-axis to the threshold value. The True/False result is output to the Compare Result.
The Compare - Gyroscope Y-axis block compares the angular velocity along the Y-axis to the threshold value. The True/False result is output to the Compare Result.
The Compare - Gyroscope Z-axis block compares the angular velocity along the Z-axis to the threshold value. The True/False result is output to the Compare Result.
